name: Grand Monster Truck Driving Sk
description:
Grand Monster Truck Driving Skill is being labeled by experts as the best game already. You find yourself driving a monster truck and completing the seemingly impossible tasks as you participate with other drivers in this 3D derby rally.
• Mesmerizing graphics that look almost life like
• Various tracks with different tasks and challenges
• Choice of number of monster trucks
• Immersive experience because of 3D effects
• High quality sound effects that appears real
• Increasing level of difficulty
